participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and sociable, enjoys exploring new hobbies and cultures.
participant_1.background: I have a family who works in the retail industry, so I often get discounts on my favorite clothes. i like going to foreign countries. i love to crochet. I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music. My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, loves to pursue new challenges and hobbies.
participant_2.background: My first big purchase was my home. I realized that I have more control over my life than I thought I did. I'd love to be a pilot like my brother. i am passionate about a lot of things. I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! What about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking!
What do you do for fun?
I enjoy crocheting, horror movies, and rock music.
I'm a fan of horror movies too! I've been wanting to learn how to crochet.
Crocheting is a great way to relax and de-stress.
What's your favorite thing about crocheting?
I love being able to create something with my own hands.
That's a great feeling! What's your favorite horror movie?
I'm a big fan of the "Saw" franchise.
I've heard good things about that one. I'm more of a slasher fan myself.
Slashers are great too! What's your favorite slasher movie?
I'm a big fan of the "Friday the 13th" series.
Those are great movies! I'm more of a "Halloween" fan myself.
"Halloween" is a classic!
It sure is!
It's been nice talking to you, but I've got to get going.
It's been nice talking to you too! Have a great day!
You too
